name: Soup Trouble
description:
a game for the MS PAINT JAM 2021. You collect as many cans as you can with different random generations to make it different!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Interact with UI

Credits:

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

I’ll meet you there by Sapajou https://soundcloud.com/sapajoubeats
